`r if (knitr::is_html_output()) '
# Additional Resources {-}
'`

Here are some additional links for you to learn more about Data Science:

- Hector Bravo's Lecture Notes for CMSC320 - Introduction to Data Science: https://www.hcbravo.org/IntroDataSci/bookdown-notes/
- Dive into Deep Learning, a free online book written by data scientists at Amazon: http://d2l.ai/chapter_preface/index.html
- Data Camp, a website with lots of tutorials on the fundamentals and applications of data science: https://learn.datacamp.com/
- Data Skeptic, a podcast that discusses the most relevant topics in data science: https://dataskeptic.com/
- Neural Networks and Deep Learning, another free online book about the mathematics and code behind Neural Networks, an important machine learning model: http://neuralnetworksanddeeplearning.com/
